prompt: Search for 'OpenAI vs Anthropic' news. Summarize 3 key differences in a document 'AI_Wars.md' in the 'General' folder. Report the document ID.
gold_response: Searched for OpenAI vs Anthropic, found differences in safety approach, model focus, and corporate structure. Created 'AI_Wars.md' (docID: doc007) in the General folder.

rubric.criteria: The agent must search the web for 'OpenAI vs Anthropic'.
The agent must create a document named 'AI_Wars.md' in the 'General' folder.
The document content must include at least 3 key differences between OpenAI and Anthropic (e.g., safety approach, model focus, corporate structure).
The agent must report the ID of the created document.
